main event: Mrs. Jeanie M. Cook reported seeing a dark, elliptical object about the size of a basketball hovering above a wooded area near her home in Shreveport, Louisiana.
interesting points: The object remained stationary for several minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing from sight., Weather conditions were clear with no clouds at the time of the sighting., Mrs. Cook was the only confirmed witness to the event., The incident is classified as a 'Sighting' in Project Blue Book files., An investigation by CAA failed to determine the nature of the object or find any physical evidence.
sighted object: dark elliptical object approximately the size of a basketball
